author: Bruno Simon
title: Portfolio
techStack: JavaScript, Vite,Three.js, Cannon.js, GSAP , dat.gui, Howler.js, Blender
description: An interactive 3D portfolio built using Three.js, Cannon.js, and Blender, showcasing the work of creative developer Bruno Simon. It features gamified navigation, real-time physics, and smooth animations powered by GSAP and WebGL. This playful, immersive experience highlights both technical expertise and design innovation. bruno-simon.com
